attributes.additional_details: Repeal the rule of six (6). Hold accountable Matt Hancock for using the wrong legislation and infringing basic civil rights of healthy members of the public and causing undue stress and fear by imposing a law that is not based on actual science or correct legislation.
attributes.background: To repeal the rule of six (6) law making it a criminal offence to gather in groups more than six (6). As it is not only an infringement on our civil liberties, but the wrong legislation so as not to be held accountable.
